  - Player Development

## FlightScope Data

- Pitch Basics
  - Speed, Location
- Release
  - Height, Side, Extension
- Spin
  - Rate, Axis
- Movement
  - Vertical (Induced), Horizontal
- 50 feet
  - Movement, Velocity, Acceleration
- Batted Ball
  - Exit Velocity, Launch Angle, Direction, Distance
